title: Master Sushi Chefs teach signature rolls in Sushi & Me classes
statement: Master Sushi Chefs help participants learn to make signature Benihana sushi rolls including the California Roll and Shrimp Crunchy Roll.

citations.quote: With the help of one of our Master Sushi Chefs, both the child and adult will learn to make signature Benihana sushi rolls including the California Roll and Shrimp Crunchy Roll.
